attributes.action: Life Lessons to be compulsory in UK schools
attributes.additional_details: It is crucial that we place a stronger emphasis on PHSE and citizenship in our schools, and to overhaul the PHSE and Citizenship curriculum via a youth lead review. It's vital that we engage the adults of tomorrow, in the world around them today. We must ensure an engaged and active generation. Furthermore teachers should have a national standard of training to combat the disparities in citizenship education across the UK.
